title: Factor
text: Factor the denominator and numerator where possible.
speech: Factor the denominator and numerator where possible.

title: Multiply
text: Multiply the numerators and the denominators of each fraction.
speech: Multiply the numerators and the denominators of each fraction.

title: Common Factors
text: Find common factors between the numerator and denomiator, and group them.
speech: Find common factors between the numerator and denomiator, and group them.

title: Power Rules
text: Use the power rules to simplify variables, subtracting when powers are divided, and adding powers when they are multiplied.
speech: Use the power rules to simplify variables, subtracting when powers are divided, and adding powers when they are multiplied.

title: Simplify
text: Simplify the fractions, such that there is only one instance of a variable in the fraction.
speech: Simplify the fractions, such that there is only one instance of a variable in the fraction.
